name: submgmrcl

stmt.origin: sseldi(c1, cmgm, cdm(csubmgm), wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c1, cmgm))
-| wss(cdm(csubmgm), cmgm)

body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Mgm)
⊣ dom(SubMgm)⊆ Mgm
⊣ (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)→ c1 ∈ dom(SubMgm))
